command: CREATE TABLE files( id serial PRIMARY KEY, url VARCHAR(220) NOT NULL);

CREATE TABLE users( id serial PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(220), uuid VARCHAR(220), second_name VARCHAR(220), email VARCHAR(220), password VARCHAR(500),img_id Integer, age Integer, user_type Integer, data JSON,active Boolean, FOREIGN KEY (img_id) REFERENCES files(id));
CREATE TABLE sessions( id serial Primary KEY, user_id INTEGER, token VARCHAR(200), exxpired Boolean, FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(id));

CREATE TABLE courses_view( id serial PRIMARY KEY, name_course VARCHAR(220), description VARCHAR(1024), author_id INTEGER, date timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW(), data JSON, price INTEGER, old_price INTEGER, FOREIGN KEY (author_id) REFERENCES users(id));
CREATE TABLE faqs( id serial PRIMARY KEY, question VARCHAR(500), answer VARCHAR(1024));

CREATE TABLE courses_video(id serial PRIMARY KEY, name  VARCHAR(220), description VARCHAR(1024),course_view_id INTEGER, video_id INTEGER, FOREIGN KEY (video_id) REFERENCES files(id), FOREIGN KEY (course_view_id) REFERENCES courses_view(id));
CREATE TABLE bought_courses(id serial PRIMARY KEY, user_id INTEGER, course_id INTEGER, FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(id), FOREIGN KEY (course_id) REFERENCES courses_view(id));
